Welcome to Langston Studio

ðŸŽ¬ What is this?

Langston Studio is your all-in-one environment for creating videos with AI. The left panel is OpenCode (your AI coding assistant), and the right panel is Remotion (your video preview).

ðŸ“‚ Getting started

First, open ~/Documents/code/langston-videos as a new project in OpenCode. This is where your project lives and has already been set up for you.

ðŸ’¬ How to create videos

Once your project is open, just describe what you want in the OpenCode chat. Try saying:

  • "Create a 10-second intro video with the text 'Hello World'"
  • "Add a fade-in animation to the title"
  • "Change the background to a gradient"
  • "Add background music"

ðŸ‘€ Previewing your video

The Remotion panel on the right updates automatically as you make changes. Use the playback controls at the bottom to scrub through your video timeline.

ðŸ“¦ Rendering your video

When you're happy with your video, ask OpenCode: "Render the video as an MP4"

The file will be saved to your project folder.

Pro Tip

Drag the divider between panels to resize them. You can also click the Help button in the toolbar anytime to see this guide again.
